attributes.action: stop people killing animals for fur.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am proposing that the PM stops people killing animals for fur. It is a cruel thing to do. The way they are killed is cruel and there is no point what so ever to killing them. There are plenty of other ways to get clothes and you can even get the fur effect without killing animals. This is the 21st century not the first century!
Please sign to help stop this cruel thing happening.
